## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G17980](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G17980)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtC2, AtGAP1, C2, CAR4</u>
- **Gene Name:** Arabidopsis thaliana C2 domain, homolog of OsGAP1, C2 domain, C2-domain ABA-related
- **Description:**   Calcium-dependent lipid-binding (CaLB domain) family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2088505
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
